original_text: The word of the Lord came to Jeremiah a second time, while he was still shut up in the court of the guard:
korean_text: 예레미야가 아직 시위대 뜰에 갇혀 있을 때에 여호와의 말씀이 그에게 두 번째로 임하니라 이르시되

sentences.original_text: The word of the Lord came to Jeremiah a second time,
sentences.korean_translation: 여호와의 말씀이 두 번째로 예레미야에게 임하니,

sentences.original_text: while he was still shut up in the court of the guard:
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 아직 시위대 뜰에 갇혀 있었는데,
